name: obsidian-tasknotes
title: Obsidian TaskNotes
description: Provides access to view, edit, create tasks in the Obsidian TaskNotes plugin.
author: devathu

commands.name: task-menu-bar
commands.title: TaskNotes Menu Bar
commands.description: Quick access to today's and overdue tasks from the menu bar

commands.name: view-tasks
commands.title: View Tasks
commands.description: Browse and manage your TaskNotes tasks with smart filters

commands.name: create-task
commands.title: Create Task
commands.description: Create a new task in TaskNotes

commands.name: quick-add-task
commands.title: Quick Add Task
commands.description: Rapidly create tasks using natural language

preferences.name: apiUrl
preferences.title: API URL
preferences.description: The base URL for the TaskNotes API (default: http://localhost)

preferences.name: apiPort
preferences.title: API Port
preferences.description: The port number for the TaskNotes API (default: 8080)

preferences.name: apiToken
preferences.title: API Token
preferences.description: Optional bearer token for API authentication
preferences.placeholder: Leave empty if no authentication is configured

preferences.name: obsidianVault
preferences.title: Obsidian Vault Name
preferences.description: The name of your Obsidian vault (required for opening tasks in Obsidian)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
